# duration

**Instance Property**

The duration of the sample.

## Declaration

```swift
var duration: CMTime
```

## Discussion

If a single struct applies to each of the samples, they all have this duration.

## Properties

- **decodeTimeStamp**: The time at which the sample will be decoded.
- **presentationTimeStamp**: The time at which the sample will be presented.
